mapper.select: select rownum as rnum, jsp_user.* from jsp_user
select * from ( select rownum as rnum, a.* from ( select jsp_user.* from jsp_user order by userId ) a ) where rnum between #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) and #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into jsp_user (userId, name, pass, addr1, addr2, zipcd, email, tel, birth, profile) values(#{userId}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcd}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
